verbose_text: The diagnostic criteria for HLH in the 2004 guidelines include fever, splenomegaly, cytopenias affecting at least two of the three lineages, hypertriglyceridemia and/or hypofibrinogenema, hemaphagocytosis in the bone marrow spleen or lymph nodes, low / absent NK-cell activity, hyperferritinemia and high levels of sIL-2r 5.
